info.name: Testimonials Module
info.description: API endpoints for testimonial management including CRUD operations for client testimonials

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Get single testimonial details by ID (public access)

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Testimonial retrieved successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": "testimonial-uuid-here",
    "name": "John Smith",
    "message": "Excellent service! They fixed my phone screen in no time. Highly recommended!",
    "rating": 5,
    "position": "CEO",
    "company": "Tech Solutions Inc.",
    "image": {
      "id": "image-uuid",
      "url": "https://example.com/testimonial-image.jpg",
      "publicId": "testimonial-image-id",
      "folder": "app/testimonials",
      "altText": "John Smith testimonial",
      "width": 200,
      "height": 200,
      "format": "jpg",
      "size": 50000
    },
    "isActive": true,
    "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
  }
}

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "message": "Outstanding service! The team was professional and efficient. My device was repaired quickly and perfectly.",
  "rating": 5,
  "position": "Marketing Manager",
  "company": "Digital Agency",
  "image": {
    "url": "https://example.com/jane-testimonial.jpg",
    "publicId": "jane-testimonial-id",
    "folder": "app/testimonials",
    "altText": "Jane Doe testimonial",
    "width": 200,
    "height": 200,
    "format": "jpg",
    "size": 45000
  },
  "isActive": true
}
